<h1 align="center">
  Gatsby Blog
</h1>

**How to setup and contribute**

  Fork this repository

  ```shell
  git clone https://github.com/<your username>/gatsby-blog
  cd gatsby-blog/
  git remote add upstream https://github.com/renatamarques97/gatsby-blog
  ```

  Create a new branch

  ```shell
  git checkout -b your-branch
  ```

  Push your changes
  Create a Pull Request ðŸš€

**Open the source code and start editing!**

  Run the project

  ```shell
  gatsby develop
  ```

  Your site is now running at `http://localhost:8000`!
